question:
Which of the following is the correct chronological order of?
i) Formation of Utkal union conference
ii) Formation of Utkal union samillani
iii) Peasant revolt at Kanika
iv) Formation of Satyabadi school
explanation: Formation of Utkal union conference (1903), Formation of Utkal union samillani (1905), Peasant revolt at Kanika (1922), Formation of Satyabadi school (1909)
